alert.note: Alert for Sherman; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued April 13 at 4:38PM CDT until April 13 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A DUST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM MDT/600 PM CDT/ FOR WESTERN THOMAS AND EASTERN SHERMAN COUNTIES... At 337 PM MDT/437 PM CDT/, several plumes of dust were observed with weak thunderstorms across eastern Sherman and western Thomas counties. Visibilities are highly variable and will change rapidly in these areas. HAZARD...Less than a mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 50 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 23 and 45. Locations impacted include... Brewster and Edson. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust can be unhealthy and has been known to lead to Valley Fever. Avoid outdoor exposure. Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
